citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility provides enrichment to the birds, they do not have a written environmental enhancement plan in
place to promote the overall psychological well-being of the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document, and
follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds. A
written environmental enhancement plan must be developed that is within industry standards and approved by the
attending veterinarian. Correct by March 4, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and facility representative.
n

Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Although the facility provides enrichment to the birds, they do not have a written environmental enhancement plan in 
place to promote the overall psychological well-being of the birds at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document, and 
follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of birds. A 
written environmental enhancement plan must be developed that is within industry standards and approved by the 
attending veterinarian. Correct by March 4, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee and facility representative.
